TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PageSettings extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 指定套用至單一列印頁面的設定。

span.span: Specifies settings that apply to a single, printed page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別用來指定修改頁面列印的方式的設定。The class is used to specify settings that modify the way a page will be printed. 一般而言，您設定的所有頁面的預設設定，以透過列印屬性。Typically, you set default settings for all pages to be printed through the property. 若要指定頁面的頁面為基礎的設定，請處理或事件，並修改引數包含在或分別。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. 如需有關處理事件，請參閱類別概觀。For more information about handling events, see the class overview. 如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱命名空間概觀。For more information about printing, see the namespace overview. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何處理事件，並檢查引數。The following example demonstrates handling the event and checking the argument of . 若要使用此程式碼，加入名元件`PrintDocument1`至 Windows 表單和關聯其事件`printDocument1_PrintPage`在範例中的方法。To use this code, add a component named `PrintDocument1` to a Windows Form and associate its event with the `printDocument1_PrintPage` method in the example. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/CS/Form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.MiscBugDriven/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 初始化的新執行個體類別使用的預設印表機。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the default printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設建構函式會初始化為其預設值的所有欄位。The default constructor initializes all fields to their default values. 一般而言，您未建立的執行個體，而是使用若要設定的所有頁面的設定。Typically, you do not create an instance of , but instead use the to set settings for all pages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要初始化的新執行個體的建構函式大致並設定屬性。The constructor is similar to initializing a new instance of and setting the property.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否應該以彩色列印的頁面。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page should be printed in color.

value.span: 如果色彩; 要列印的頁面，否則， 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in color; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來判斷是否印表機支援彩色列印。You can use the property to determine if the printer supports color printing. 如果印表機支援彩色，但您不想用彩色來列印，請設定屬性設`false`。If the printer supports color, but you do not want to print in color, set the property to `false`. 預設行為是`true`。The default will be `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會列印具有彩色的第一頁的文件，如果印表機支援它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`已建立，而和會處理事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和此範例中的命名空間。Use the and namespaces for this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，將複製相關資訊，以`DEVMODE`結構。Call the method to copy relevant information to a `DEVMODE` structure from a . 這個方法很有用，當您想要進行 unmanaged 的 Win32 呼叫需要`DEVMODE`。This method is useful when you want to make unmanaged Win32 calls that require a `DEVMODE`. 若要複製的資訊`DEVMODE`結構，呼叫。To copy information from a `DEVMODE` structure to the , call .

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否以橫向] 或 [直向列印頁面。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the page is printed in landscape or portrait orientation.

value.span: 如果頁面應該會以橫向列印;，否則， 。

span.span: if the page should be printed in landscape orientation; otherwise, .
The default is determined by the printer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用屬性來確定角度（角度），即縱向方向旋轉以產生橫向方向。You can use the property to determine the angle, in degrees, that the portrait orientation is rotated to produce the landscape orientation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定為透過橫向的文件的預設頁面方向屬性，並列印文件。The following code example sets a document's default page orientation to landscape through the property, and prints the document. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`已列印設定檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 名為的方法`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 取得或設定這個頁面的邊界。

span.span: Gets or sets the margins for this page.

value.span: A表示邊界，以百分之一英吋為單位，頁面。

span.span: A that represents the margins, in hundredths of an inch, for the page.

value.span: 預設值是 1 英吋邊界所有側邊。

span.span: The default is 1-inch margins on all sides.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理時事件，您可以使用這個屬性連同來計算頁面的列印區域的屬性。When handling the event, you can use this property along with the property to calculate the printing area for the page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設定預設文件的頁面設定為 1 英吋的邊界每一端。The following code example sets the default page settings for a document to margins to 1 inch on each side. 此範例包含三個必要條件：The example has three prerequisites: - 名為的變數`filePath`已列印設定檔案的路徑。A variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print. - 名為的方法`pd_PrintPage`，以處理已定義事件。A method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined. - 名為的變數`printer`已設為印表機的名稱。A variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和此範例中的命名空間。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. summary.span: 取得或設定頁面的紙張大小。

span.span: Gets or sets the paper size for the page.
A that represents the size of the paper.

value.span: 預設為印表機的預設紙張大小。

span.span: The default is the printer's default paper size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A表示透過紙張大小屬性，其中包含的其中一個值。A represents the size of the paper through the property, which contains one of the values. 設定屬性頁面，即可有效，可透過集合。Set the property for the page to a valid , available through the collection. 如需您可以指定自訂紙張大小的方式，請參閱建構函式。For information about how you can specify a custom paper size, see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定文件的預設頁面，包括根據中選取的大小的紙張大小的三個屬性`comboPaperSize`下拉式方塊，然後列印文件使用方法。The following code example sets three properties for the document's default page, including the paper size based upon the size selected in the `comboPaperSize` combo box, and then prints the document using the method. 這個範例需要名為變數`printDoc`存在和存在於特定的下拉式方塊。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` exists and that the specific combo boxes exist. summary.span: 取得或設定與頁面關聯的印表機設定。
